faqs.q: How many calories in one Ferrero Rocher?
What are the macros in a Ferrero Rocher?
faqs.a: About 6.8 g carbs, 5.5 g fat, 1 g protein, with 5.8 g sugars.

faqs.q: Does Ferrero Rocher have trans fats?
faqs.a: No trans fats; saturated fat is around 2.5 g per piece.

faqs.q: How much sodium in a Ferrero Rocher?
Are Ferrero Rocher calories high in sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, most carbs are sugars (5.8 g out of 6.8 g total carbs).
